pages.text: uhille lekum saydu-lbahri veta`amuhu meta`al lekum velissayyarah. vehurrime `aleykum saydu-lberri ma dumtum huruma. vetteku-llahe-llezi ileyhi tuhserun
ce`ale-llahu-lka`bete-lbeyte-lharame kiyamel linnasi vessehra-lharame velhedye velkalaid. zalike lita`lemu enne-llahe ya`lemu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ardi veenne-llahe bikulli sey'in `alim
i`lemu enne-llahe sedidu-l`ikabi veenne-llahe gafurur rahim
ma `ale-rrasuli ille-lbelag. vellahu ya`lemu ma tubdune vema tektumun
kul la yestevi-lhabisu vettayyibu velev a`cebeke kesratu-lhabis. fetteku-llahe ya uli-l'elbabi le`allekum tuflihun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu la tes'elu `an esyae in tubde lekum tesu'kum. vein tes'elu `anha hine yunezzelu-lkur'anu tubde lekum. `afe-llahu `anha. vellahu gafurun halim
kad seeleha kavmum min kablikum summe asbehu biha kafirin
ma ce`ale-llahu mim behirativ vela saibetiv vela vesiletiv vela hamiv velakinne-llezine keferu yefterune `ale-llahi-lkezib. veekseruhum la ya`kilun
